title: Active Learning Strategy Design and Implementation for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical science knowledge and 1–3 years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Course operations for healthcare professionals to improve problem-solving skills in real work settings. Requires real-time collaborative learning environments using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: Learners can design a lesson plan applying five or more active learning techniques to practical settings
Through peer assessment and self-reflection, learners can identify three or more barriers to active learning implementation and propose solutions
Based on survey data analysis, learners can develop active learning strategies optimized for healthcare professional education settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
